test.name: TC01 - Validating the address of this zip code

kw.name: Given the user want to know the the address of this zip code
Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=mysession, url=https://viacep.com.br/ws/, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: When the user chooses the zip code
GET On Session
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: GET Request : url=https://viacep.com.br/ws/13140770/json path_url=/ws/13140770/json headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.28.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None

GET Response : url=https://viacep.com.br/ws/13140770/json status=200, reason=OK headers={'Server': 'nginx/1.22.0', 'Date': 'Wed, 14 Dec 2022 14:54:50 GMT', 'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Transfer-Encoding': 'chunked', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Expires': 'Wed, 14 Dec 2022 15:54:50 GMT', 'Cache-Control': 'max-age=3600, public', 'Pragma': 'public', 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin': '*', 'Access-Control-Allow-Methods': 'GET', 'Access-Control-Allow-Headers': 'Content-Type, X-Request-With, X-Requested-By', 'Access-Control-Allow-Credentials': 'true', 'Access-Control-Max-Age': '86400'} body={ "cep": "13140-770", "logradouro": "Avenida Doutor Alexandre Martins Laroca", "complemento": "de 34 ao fim - lado par", "bairro": "Santa Terezinha", "localidade": "Paulínia", "uf": "SP", "ibge": "3536505", "gia": "5137", "ddd": "19", "siafi": "6831" }
